A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This movie is splitting fans right down the middle\, I for one am on the light side. I loved this movie\, in my opinion the best Star Wars movie since Return of the Jedi (I will always consider the original trilogy as the best movies). Mark Hamill is at his best\, and the same goes for Carrie Fisher. This movie takes a lot of chances and certainly has a flaw or two\, but I really thought this was an exciting movie that kept me surprised.
